name: Gatcha Haven
description:
Discover, Unlock, and Battle with your favourite Pop Culture Characters!

All of the art for this game was done by amazing Skye Lavelle who has worked super hard to get it all done in time! 
Check Out Her Socials!
www.instagram.com/_.mayushii._
www.behance.net/skyelavelle
twitter.com/LavelleSkye 

You can find more of me as well over on Twitter!
 twitter.com/TheDeclanSmyth 

Controls: Most of the game is navigated with the Mouse, you can also go to the previous menu with the 'Esc' key. The 'Esc' key will also open the Pause Menu when you are in combat.
